sys_metadata_link.payload: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting"> <x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <code_url/> <code_url_2/> <details>For example, you may to set the date of when a stage was achieved  </details> <example_steps/> <example_url/> <module/> <number>SNSCRIPT0001019</number> <replaced_by/> <script>Set "When to run" using the Filter Conditions  Set Filed values Actions to set your field to "Same as" "Updated" field </script> <script_2/> <script_type>Business Rule</script_type> <short_description>Set a field based on another field being updated </short_description> <state>Submitted</state> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2016-08-12 00:44:52</sys_created_on> <sys_id>ae5599bb13012a00dd7db5b12244b0fc</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2016-08-28 22:29:15</sys_updated_on> <tested_on_helsinki/> </x_snc_servicenow_s_servicenow_scripting> </record_update>
